verbs.description: FLORENCE — A Florence man [V: has] been arrested in connection with political graffiti containing a negative portrayal of President Donald Trump spray painted on a downtown billboard .
FLORENCE — A Florence man has [V: been] arrested in connection with political graffiti containing a negative portrayal of President Donald Trump spray painted on a downtown billboard .

FLORENCE — [ARG1: A Florence man] has been [V: arrested] [ARG2: in connection with political graffiti containing a negative portrayal of President Donald Trump spray painted on a downtown billboard] .

FLORENCE — A Florence man has been arrested in connection with [ARG0: political graffiti] [V: containing] [ARG1: a negative portrayal of President Donald Trump] spray painted on a downtown billboard .

FLORENCE — A Florence man has been arrested in connection with political graffiti containing a negative portrayal of [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: spray] [V: painted] [ARGM-LOC: on a downtown billboard] .
